column1: Table of the lines used in the parasitism success experiment of this study
line_id: unique identifier for each line
host_clone: identifier of the recipient aphid line used for the transfection
donor_id: identifier of the H. defensa donor aphid line we collected in the field
year: year of the collection and transfection
site: name of the sampling site
plant_species: host plant from which the sample was collected
aphid_species: species name of the collected sample
note: additionnal relevant information for each line

column10: Identical H. defensa genotype to one strain we sampled in 2019, in Zürich
This aphid line was collected in 2006 in St. Margarethen. It does not host H. defensa and was used as a recipient line for transfection (all TR-xxxx), or stayed untransfected as a control (NTR-0407)
